# Awesome CLI

An awesome command-line interface built with Typer, Rich, and InquirerPy.

## Installation

```bash
pip install awesome-cli-app
```

## Usage

```bash
awesome-cli --help
```

- ðŸš€ Fast and intuitive CLI
- ðŸŽ¨ Beautiful terminal output with Rich
- ðŸ’¬ Interactive prompts with InquirerPy

## Development

```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/awesome-cli
cd awesome-cli
pip install -e .
```
